original_title: Norway’s Great Sleddog Race: Bergebyløpet N70
overview: The only long-distance sled dog race (650 km) held above the seventieth parallel, beyond the Arctic Circle. Shot along the shores of Varanger Fjord (Norway), the documentary deals with the amazing bond between man and dog.  Already available at Amazon Prime (North America), Alexander Street, Qatar Airways, Norwegian Airlines, Finnair.
title: Norway’s Great Sleddog Race: Bergebyløpet N70
